description: This file appears to be a BitBake recipe included file (.inc) that defines dependencies, paths, and functions related to cross-compiling Rust components within an embedded Linux build system. It sets variables, dependencies, and includes functions for target generation and build configuration, specific to Rust cross-compilation environments.

methods.name: do_rust_gen_targets
methods.description: Generates target configurations for Rust cross-compilation, including target, host, and build environments based on various variables.

methods.name: do_configure:prepend
methods.description: Prepares lists of target and host system configurations used during build configuration.
